subject: International journal PEEMS2019 (EI+SCOPUS Index) ISSN: 2475-8833
body:
| About PEEMS2019 Welcome to 2019 International Conference Power, Energy, Environment and Material Science (PEEMS2019), it will take place in Sanya, China on December 22-23, 2019. Prospective authors are invited to submit research abstracts or full papers. PEEMS2019 aims to provide a platform for scholars, experts and researchers from all over the world, to to exchange their ideas and experiences in the fields of Power, Energy, Environment and Material Science. All full paper submitted to the PEEMS2019 will be peer reviewed and evaluated based on originality, technical, research content, research depth, correctness, relevance to conference, contributions, and readability. On behalf of the organizing committee, we cordially invite researchers, engineers, academicians as well as industrial professionals to participate in PEEMS2019. Publication Papers submitted to PEEMS2019 will be reviewed by technical committees of the conference. All accepted full papers will be submitted to EI Compendex, Scopus, Thomson Reuters CPCI-S, Google Scholar and CNKI Scholar for indexing. Authors will be invited to give oral presentations at the conference. | | | Accepted abstract will be included in the conference guide but will not be published. About PEEMS2019

Welcome to 2019 International Conference Power, Energy, Environment and Material Science (PEEMS2019), it will take place in Sanya, China on December 22-23, 2019.

Prospective authors are invited to submit research abstracts or full papers. PEEMS2019 aims to provide a platform for scholars, experts and researchers from all over the world, to to exchange their ideas and experiences in the fields of Power, Energy, Environment and Material Science. All full paper submitted to the PEEMS2019 will be peer reviewed and evaluated based on originality, technical, research content, research depth, correctness, relevance to conference, contributions, and readability. On behalf of the organizing committee, we cordially invite researchers, engineers, academicians as well as industrial professionals to participate in PEEMS2019.

Publication

Papers submitted to PEEMS2019 will be reviewed by technical committees of the conference. All accepted full papers will be submitted to EI Compendex, Scopus, Thomson Reuters CPCI-S, Google Scholar and CNKI Scholar for indexing.  EI, CPCI-S (ISTP) and CNKI ScholarEI CPCI-S CNKI PEEMS2019 EISCI

Paper Submission

Both Full paper and Abstract are welcome.

English is the official language of the conference. Papers submitted to the conference should be written in English.

Accepted full paper will be published in the journal of DEStech Transactions on Environment, Energy and Earth Sciences with ISSN: 2475-8833. Authors will be invited to give oral presentations at the conference.

Accepted abstract will be included in the conference guide but will not be published. Authors also can give oral presentations at the conference.

1. Please submit your paper via email: submit@peems2019.org Before October 14th, 2019 

2. Formats of doc and docx are acceptable.

3. Manuscript length should be 4 pages at least (Authors will be charged extra 60 USD/page if the manuscript length is more than 5 pages).
